page.title: 11Woburn Lifestyle 3
page.content: {Boutiques and Fashion } Three new shops have recently opened in Woburn. These have a definite 'up market' flavour and there is a strong emphasis on personal service. {Stephanie}is housed in a Georgian building in the Market Place. The collections have a strong sense of fashion and colour and together with matching accessories are designed to appeal to the young working girl through to the well styled woman. {Sharmans Shoes}concentrates on exclusive and fashionable shoes. Matching handbags and belts are available.{Questor}combines fine antiques and elegant clothes in one shop. Specially designed hats to match any outfit and a complete dressmaking service are offered.{Hairizon} completes the picture with an artistic approach to hair and beauty.
